resources.string: Tap on the cards to bury yer Booty!
Tap on the cards to set yer Traps!
Arr! Move yer Booty! If yer dare!
Toss the ol\' land lubbin\' coin to see who goes first!
Guess heads or tails for the first turn coin toss cap\'n!
Are you sure you want to quit the game? (You will automatically lose the game and any progress made towards earning achievements)
Are you sure you want to quit? (You will lose any progress made towards earning achievements)

string-array.name: playerFirst
string-array.item: Ahoy! Me maty! Yer get to go first!
Bless the bellows! Yer going first!
Thar she blows! Ye be plunderin\' first!
Yer got the first turn to find some Booty!
Blow me down! Yer be goin\' first!

string-array.name: opponentFirst
string-array.item: Scallywags! Yer opponent be going first!
Curses! Yer opponent be pillaging first!
Arr! Yer opponent be lookin\' for booty first!
Yer opponent be plunderin\' first!
Yer opponent be searchin\' for booty first!

string-array.name: playerTurn
string-array.item: It be yer turn to dig for some Booty!
Arr! Get diggin\' to find some treasure!
Avast! It\'s yer turn to find some of yer opponent\'s Booty!
Man the Deck! Best get lookin\' for Booty!
Weigh Anchor! Get lookin\' for Booty!

string-array.name: opponentTurn
string-array.item: Yer thievin\' opponent be lookin\' for yer Booty!
Yer freebooter opponent be lookin\' for yer Booty!
Arr! Yer opponent be trying to plunder yer Booty!
Avast! Yer scurvy riddled opponent be lookin\' for Booty!
Arr! Yer opponent is searchin\' for yer Booty!

string-array.name: switchTurn
string-array.item: Matey! Decide if yer swivel gunnin\' yer Booty!
Blimey Buccaneer! Yer can move yer Booty around!
Bilging Blaggards! Move yer Booty if yer want to!
Yer keelhauling cutlass, Yer can move yer Booty about!
Belay the mast! Get movin\' yer Booty!
